Hi all - 

Just an inquiry tonight while thinking about tsuba...

Late September/early October of 2006 there was a very interesting tsuba for sale on the web site of Choshua shop in Tokyo, signed by the shinshin-to smith, Jirotaro Naokatsu. It sold while I was "scratching my head" over it. I know how these things do move around after awhile so it's worth asking...if one of you purchased that tsuba and today, might consider moving it -- cash or trade -- please let me know. 

It never hurts to ask! I'm at:  swords@... 

Ron
STL
